Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response:
Teacher feedback (especially in classes not so much from assessments as a lot of it can be very generalized) is very helpful and reliable! 
AI feedback is not the most reliable so you always need to take it with a grain of salt, it’s also sometimes just completely wrong

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Not really, most uni lectures that I have had also aren’t the best at giving feedback so sometimes it feels as helpful as AI (which is about 50% helpful) but teacher feedback is usually significantly more relevant and reliable

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: AI never makes me feel stupid for asking questions or clarifying information where as I have had several tutors have belittled me when I have asked for clarification.
